title: [SOLVED]820-3209 Not charging.
message: I have an otherwise fully functional 820-3209 board. The only thing it's not doing is charging the battery. It will turn on and run off of the battery, but won't charge it. The board was beat to shit and the U7000 area was terrible. Many wires run. Any ideas what I might still be missing?

title: [SOLVED]820-3209 Not charging.
message: Trace to pin 4 of Q7055? What is PPBUS without battery?

title: [SOLVED]820-3209 Not charging.
message: Yes, that was one of the last things I checked but it's fine. Continuity from pin 4 to Q7055 is good. Voltage is in a normal range, around 8.35V.

title: [SOLVED]820-3209 Not charging.
message: Nevermind, got it. Thanks. One of my many wires (the one to R7052) was attached but not making a consistent good connection.
